dyn.desc: Parameter 1900(NL)Loop(NL)Heat Hysteresis(NL)Set the control switching hysteresis for on-off control. This determines how far into the 'on' region the process value needs to move before the output turns on.(NL)(NL)Type: double(NL)0.001 - Min(NL)5555.000 - Max(NL)(NL)DIAGS:(NL)MB_Regs: 74,75(NL)- ParamIds: 1901,1900(NL)MBVal_Regs: 234,235(NL)- MBValRegVals_asInt16: 0,0(NL)

This determines how far into the 'on' region the process value needs to move before the output turns on.'(NL)(NL)Type: double(NL)0.001 - Min(NL)5555.000 - Max(NL)(NL)DIAGS:(NL)MB_Regs: 76,77(NL)- ParamIds: 1903,1902(NL)MBVal_Regs: 236,237(NL)- MBValRegVals_asInt16: 0,0(NL)
dyn.name: 1902: ControlLoop CoolHysteresis

dyn.desc: Parameter 1898(NL)Control Loop (1 to 2) Dead Band - Set the offset to the proportional band. With a negative value, both heating and cooling outputs are active when the process value is near the set point. A positive value keeps heating and cooling outs from fighting each other.(NL)(Range -556 to 556°C. Default 0.0)(NL)(NL)(NL)DIAGS:(NL)MB_Regs: 78,79(NL)- ParamIds: 1899,1898(NL)MBVal_Regs: 238,239(NL)- MBValRegVals_asInt16: 0,0(NL)
dyn.name: 1898: ControlLoop DeadBand

dyn.desc: Parameter 1900(NL)Loop(NL)Heat Hysteresis(NL)Set the control switching hysteresis for on-off control. This determines how far into the 'on' region the process value needs to move before the output turns on.(NL)(NL)Type: double(NL)0.001 - Min(NL)5555.000 - Max(NL)(NL)DIAGS:(NL)MB_Regs: 74,75(NL)- ParamIds: 1901,1900(NL)MBVal_Regs: 234,235(NL)- MBValRegVals_asInt16: 0,0(NL)

This determines how far into the 'on' region the process value needs to move before the output turns on.'(NL)(NL)Type: double(NL)0.001 - Min(NL)5555.000 - Max(NL)(NL)DIAGS:(NL)MB_Regs: 76,77(NL)- ParamIds: 1903,1902(NL)MBVal_Regs: 236,237(NL)- MBValRegVals_asInt16: 0,0(NL)
dyn.name: 1902: ControlLoop CoolHysteresis

dyn.desc: Parameter 1898(NL)Control Loop (1 to 2) Dead Band - Set the offset to the proportional band. With a negative value, both heating and cooling outputs are active when the process value is near the set point. A positive value keeps heating and cooling outs from fighting each other.(NL)(Range -556 to 556°C. Default 0.0)(NL)(NL)(NL)DIAGS:(NL)MB_Regs: 78,79(NL)- ParamIds: 1899,1898(NL)MBVal_Regs: 238,239(NL)- MBValRegVals_asInt16: 0,0(NL)
dyn.name: 1898: ControlLoop DeadBand
